Imagine you wake up one day and you choose not to worry your day away and decide to give it a fair shake. You trust more, stress less and amplify your gratitude.
;So you resolve to do the same the next day and next. Days become weeks, weeks become months, months become years of good days. Its the way good lives are built, one day at a time!
;
;REMEMBER!
;Paul rejoiced in Prison,
;David wrote psalms in the wilderness,
;Paul and silas sang in jail and
;Jesus prayed in the garden of pain.
;So worry not my brothers and sisters. CHEERS....
